name: 2D Shooter (Hussain1933125)
description:
This my 2D Shooter Project

Modification:

1- add three levels.

2- increase the number of enemies at every level.

3- must defeat all enemies to win the game.

4- if hit by an enemy you dead and get the game over.

5- you have only one hit by an enemy. 

Credits:

Created by Hussain AlMarhoon
